rules_text:
Deception {3}{R}{W} [i]({3}{R}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, if it's the first combat phase of the turn, untap all other creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
